body_html:
Well, first thing would be to solve the linking problem properly. It seems that we might need to switch to clang if we want to use MKL (see this SO thread).

I have no idea why are you seeing different results on these machines.
body_text:
Well, first thing would be to solve the linking problem properly. It seems that we might need to switch to clang if we want to use MKL (see this SO thread).
I have no idea why are you seeing different results on these machines.
body:
Well, first thing would be to solve the linking problem properly. It seems that we might need to switch to clang if we want to use MKL (see [this SO thread](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/25986091/telling-gcc-to-not-link-libgomp-so-it-links-libiomp5-instead)).

I have no idea why are you seeing different results on these machines.
